uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.forms

Interface UpdateTemplate<BDO extends DataObject>

  • Type Parameters:
    BDO -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppUserFactory.SignupFormCreator, ClassificationFactory.ClassificationUpdater, DataObjectUpdateFormFactory, IndexedLinkManager.LinkUpdater, PartManager.PartUpdater, TextFileOverlay.TextFileUpdator, Updater, UpdateTransition, XMLOverlay.XMLFileUpdator

    public interface UpdateTemplate<BDO extends DataObject>
    Interfaces for use with an UpdateAction This allows a standard action to be used with the customisation points moved into the enclosing class.
    Author:
    spb
    See Also:
    UpdateTransition, Updater
